tokens.name: Virtual Hash Power
tokens.description: The fuel for producing blocks on Koinos.

tokens.name: Pooled VHP
tokens.description: The token issued by BurnKoin when KOIN or VHP deposits are made into the pool. Upon KOIN/VHP withdrawal, pVHP is burnt. The ratio at which pVHP is issued/redeemed for KOIN increases steadily as the network issues mining rewards.

tokens.name: Doubloon
tokens.description: Doubloon is the official currency of the Serfdom & Sorcery discord game by Royal Reptile Studios.

tokens.name: Kanvas
tokens.description: The first collaborative and decentralized canvas, based on the first fee-less smart-contract blockchain.

tokens.name: Koin Crew Token
tokens.description: Koin Crew Token in the official community coin crafted exclusively for the ardent supporters of Koin Crew. This token is not just a digital asset; it symbolizes the unwavering faith and commitment of the Koin Crew community.
